Directions: In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer chicken and broccoli. In a bowl, combine soup and mayonnaise; spoon over the broccoli. Sprinkle with cheese. Combine the crackers and butter; sprinkle over the cheese. Top with almonds. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
